# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
This project has been successfully migrated from Java 8 to Java 17, along with updating to Spring Boot 3.3.4 which requires Jakarta EE 9+.

## Changes Made

### 1. POM Configuration Updates
- Updated Java version from 8 to 17 in all pom.xml files
- Set `maven.compiler.source`, `maven.compiler.target`, and `maven.compiler.release` to 17
- Fixed duplicate maven-javadoc-plugin declaration in root pom.xml
- Removed mockito-inline dependency (functionality now integrated into mockito-core 5.x)
- Removed exclusion of mockito-core from spring-boot-starter-test
- Added spring-test dependency to tosan-camunda-client-test module

### 2. Javax to Jakarta Package Migration
The following package migrations were performed across all Java files:

#### Validation API
- `javax.validation` → `jakarta.validation`
- `javax.validation.constraints` → `jakarta.validation.constraints`

#### Servlet API  
- `javax.servlet` → `jakarta.servlet`
- `javax.servlet.http` → `jakarta.servlet.http`

#### Annotation API
- `javax.annotation.Generated` → `jakarta.annotation.Generated`
- `@javax.annotation.Generated` → `@jakarta.annotation.Generated`

### 3. Spring Framework 6 Compatibility
- Replaced `CommonsMultipartFile` (removed in Spring 6) with `MockMultipartFile`
- Removed dependency on `org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsMultipartFile`
- Removed Apache Commons FileUpload dependencies (commons-fileupload, DiskFileItem)
- Updated CamundaClientApplication.java to use `MockMultipartFile` for file uploads

### 4. Code Changes

#### CamundaClientApplication.java
- Changed from Apache Commons FileUpload to Spring's MockMultipartFile
- Simplified file reading using `InputStream.readAllBytes()`
- Removed unnecessary File and IOUtils dependencies

## Build Results
- ✅ All modules compile successfully with Java 17
- ✅ All 5 unit tests pass
- ✅ Maven verify goal completes successfully
- ✅ Javadoc generation succeeds

## Modules Updated
1. tosan-camunda-client-spring-boot-root (parent)
2. tosan-camunda-client-api
3. tosan-camunda-client-spring-boot-starter
4. tosan-camunda-client-test

## Dependencies
The project now uses:
- Java 17
- Spring Boot 3.3.4
- Jakarta EE 9+ APIs
- Mockito 5.14.2 (managed by Spring Boot)

## Testing
To build and test the project with Java 17:
```bash
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
mvn clean verify
```

All tests pass successfully with Java 17.
EOF
cat MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md

content.text:
# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
This project has been successfully migrated from Java 8 to Java 17, along with updating to Spring Boot 3.3.4 which requires Jakarta EE 9+.

## Changes Made

### 1. POM Configuration Updates
- Updated Java version from 8 to 17 in all pom.xml files
- Set `maven.compiler.source`, `maven.compiler.target`, and `maven.compiler.release` to 17
- Fixed duplicate maven-javadoc-plugin declaration in root pom.xml
- Removed mockito-inline dependency (functionality now integrated into mockito-core 5.x)
- Removed exclusion of mockito-core from spring-boot-starter-test
- Added spring-test dependency to tosan-camunda-client-test module

### 2. Javax to Jakarta Package Migration
The following package migrations were performed across all Java files:

#### Validation API
- `javax.validation` → `jakarta.validation`
- `javax.validation.constraints` → `jakarta.validation.constraints`

#### Servlet API  
- `javax.servlet` → `jakarta.servlet`
- `javax.servlet.http` → `jakarta.servlet.http`

#### Annotation API
- `javax.annotation.Generated` → `jakarta.annotation.Generated`
- `@javax.annotation.Generated` → `@jakarta.annotation.Generated`

### 3. Spring Framework 6 Compatibility
- Replaced `CommonsMultipartFile` (removed in Spring 6) with `MockMultipartFile`
- Removed dependency on `org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsMultipartFile`
- Removed Apache Commons FileUpload dependencies (commons-fileupload, DiskFileItem)
- Updated CamundaClientApplication.java to use `MockMultipartFile` for file uploads

### 4. Code Changes

#### CamundaClientApplication.java
- Changed from Apache Commons FileUpload to Spring's MockMultipartFile
- Simplified file reading using `InputStream.readAllBytes()`
- Removed unnecessary File and IOUtils dependencies

## Build Results
- ✅ All modules compile successfully with Java 17
- ✅ All 5 unit tests pass
- ✅ Maven verify goal completes successfully
- ✅ Javadoc generation succeeds

## Modules Updated
1. tosan-camunda-client-spring-boot-root (parent)
2. tosan-camunda-client-api
3. tosan-camunda-client-spring-boot-starter
4. tosan-camunda-client-test

## Dependencies
The project now uses:
- Java 17
- Spring Boot 3.3.4
- Jakarta EE 9+ APIs
- Mockito 5.14.2 (managed by Spring Boot)

## Testing
To build and test the project with Java 17:
```bash
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
```
